participant_1.name: Emily

participant_1.background: i have been working since i was sixteen years old. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith. my favorite food is mexican food.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Introverted and eccentric, Max enjoys solitude and has a creative mind, often thinking outside the box.
participant_2.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.
